resources.string: You are not connected to a device!
Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.
(Recommended pairing devices which are connected with high frequency in the system Bluetooth settings)

Tips 1: Click the first button on the right side of the title bar search for new devices, click the second button to make self available to be searched. \n\nTips 2: Talk is co-sponsored by the two sides on the need each other in the list, click on Start ready.
Bluetooth was not enabled. Leaving Bluetooth Chat.
For both parties to talk each other in the list, click to enter this interface, then click on the title bar on the right side of the Bluetooth button to connect.
If that fails, you can try to connect by another party, or restart the application and try again.
Note: The chats will not be saved
Leave this page, there is no historical record
You can long press the message to copy to the clipboard or screencast
This record has been copied to the clipboard
Ready, click on the right button to connect
